# Lochar (ward)

|elects_howmany=4
|councillor1=Tracey Little
|party1=Scottish National Party
|councillor2=Ivor Hyslop
|party2=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor3=Linda Dorward
|party3=Scottish Labour Party
|councillor4=Maureen Johnstone
|party4=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|towns=Locharbriggs
|scot_parl=Dumfriesshire
|scot_region=South Scotland

|westminster2=Dumfries and Galloway
}}
Lochar is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects four Councillors.
